titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 2446) making appropriations for military construction for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-148, by Mr. Hall (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2446. Waiving certain points of order against the bill. Bill is open to amendments. The amendments en bloc specified in the report accompanying this resolution to be offered by Rep. Fawell may amend portion of the bill prior to their having been read for amendment, shall be considered as read when offered, and not subject to a demand for division in the House or in the committee of the Whole.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 57.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/22/1993--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 2446 (military construction appropriations).
